events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position, and our team will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on the skills and experience you provided in your resume.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to your application and will contact you soon for the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening interview to discuss your software development experience and assess your fit for our engineering team.
Thank you for taking the time to respond with additional details about your previous projects and availability for technical interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC where you will discuss system design and coding challenges.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and a clear understanding of software engineering principles.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 14th to discuss company culture, benefits, and answer any questions you may have.
The HR interview concluded positively with discussions regarding your career goals and how they align with our team's vision.
We are pleased to propose you an employment offer with competitive salary and benefits reflecting your expertise as a software engineer.
Thank you for providing your feedback and sharing your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team and contributing to exciting projects.
We are delighted that you accepted the offer and look forward to welcoming you to our software development team.
Your onboarding process has started, and you will receive all necessary resources and support to get integrated smoothly into your new engineering role.
The hiring process is now complete, and we are excited to have you officially join our company as a valued software engineer.
